flowRoot.flowPara: Using person-detecting sensors to enhance presence services
Install Aware Office sensor at each employee workstation
Automatically update IM status and lock screens
How Aware Office Improves Team Agility
Keep screens from being locked when sitting at desk but not actively using workstation
Coworkers don't waste time walking to each others' offices to find that no one is there

text.tspan: Event data relevant to a particular physical location
Aggregates event data for the entire office

flowRoot.flowPara: Client runs by itself or paired with a central server
Link multiple workstations under a single identity
